activities: For more than 100 years, Equifax, Inc. (Equifax) has been a catalyst for commerce by bringing businesses and consumers together. Equifax also provides products and services that bring businesses together with other businesses. This application covers the following Equifax affiliates when they provide the following services and support:  (a) Equifax Technology Solutions, LLC, (ETS) and Equifax Information Services, LLC (EIS), US subsidiaries of Equifax, when they provide support for Equifax Iberica, S. L. (Equifax Iberica) business clients. Equifax Iberica transfers client data for processing to ETS when ETS provides support for Equifax Iberica business clients who purchase Equifax software solutions. Equifax Iberica also transfers data to EIS, which provides data quality assurance services and analytic services for Equifax Iberica;  and (b) Compliance Data Center, Inc. (CDC) and EIS when they perform services for their business clients which provide CDC and EIS with personal information the business clients obtained from data subjects located in European Union member countries.
personaldata: Client and customer data; transaction logs. Manually processed data not included.
